help:
Look at all the commands or a specific command usage. Usage:
```{}help (<command name>)```
guilds:
Look at all the servers where the bot is or remove the bot from a server (command only for bot owner). Usage:
```{}guilds (leave) (<server name>)```
plugins:
Shows a list of plugins (command only for bot owner). Usage:
```{}plugins```
blacklist:
Manage blacklisted channels on the guild. Usage:
```{}blacklist```
emojiinfo:
Shows informations about a custom emoji. Usage:
```{}emojiinfo <emoji>```
cloneemoji:
Clones a custom emoji on the guild (you need nitro to run the command). Usage:
```{}cloneemoji <emoji>```
profile:
Shows your or a member's information. Usage:
```{}profile (<member>)```
guild:
Shows information on the server. Usage:
```{}guild```
emojis:
Shows all emojis on the server. Usage:
```{}emojis```
membercount:
Returns the number of people on the server. Usage:
```{}membercount```
quote:
Quote a message by sending the message link. Usage:
```{}quote <message link>```
color:
Shows information on a color. Usage:
```{}color <color (hex)>```
role:
Shows information on a role. Usage:
```{}role <role>```
search:
Search for a member in the server, unsing his name or nick. Usage:
```{}search <text>```
discrim:
Search for a member in the server, using his discriminator. Usage:
```{}search <discriminator>```
cat:
Sends a random cat picture. Usage:
```{}cat```
dog:
Sends a random dog picture. Usage:
```{}dog```
avatar:
Sends your or a member's avatar. Usage:
```{}avatar (<member>)```
say:
Make the bot say something. Usage:
```{}say <text>```
giveaway: Create a giveaway. Command not ready yet...
ban:
Bans someone of the server. Usage:
```{}ban <member>```
kick:
Kicks someone of the server. Usage:
```{}kick <member>```
purge:
Cleans an amount of message in the channel. Usage:
```{}purge <amount>```
massrole:
Gives or removes a role for everyone. Usage:
```{}massrole <action> <role>```
mod-logs:
Add or remove a logs channel on your server. Usage:
```{}mod-logs (<action>) (<channel>)```
welcome:
Shows information on automatic join message. You can also simulate a join. Usage:
```{}welcome (simulate)```
welcome-channel:
Add or remove a welcome channel on your server (automatic welcome messages will be sent in this channel). Usage:
```{}welcome-channel <action> (<channel>)```
welcome-message:
Add or remove a welcome message on your server. Usage:
```{}welcome-message <action> (<message>)```
leave:
Shows information on automatic leave message. You can also simulate a leave. Usage:
```{}leave (simulate)```
leave-message:
Add or remove a leave message on your server. Usage:
```{}leave-message <action> (<message>)```
leave-channel:
Add or remove a leave channel on your server (automatic leave messages will be sent in this channel). Usage:
```{}leave-channel <action> (<channel>)```
autorole:
Add/Remove or look at the autorole set on your server. Usage:
```{}autorole (<action>) (<role>)```
documentation:
Link to the online bot documentation. Usage:
```{}documentation```
website:
Link to the bot website. Usage:
```{}website```
support:
Link to the Support Server. Usage:
```{}support```
